Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Cinema-RF FMV (30fps)
Mod.Author: AxlRose
Mod.Description:
Cinema-RF replaces the FMV's in Final Fantasy 8 with new, 30FPS, AI enhanced with countless hours of manual tweaking to keep them as close to the original as possible.
With twice the resolution of the originals, and integrated high quality music from the original PSX, this FMV pack makes the FMV's look the way we thought they looked all those years ago.
